text: @piersmorgan @RishiSunak You've condemned this Government over their handling of Coronavirus. The same Government whose underfunded our heroes in the NHS for a decade. It doesn't matter whose steering the Tory ship, they're a party of greed, lies & spineless weasels! #StarmerForPM
